function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of clear definition for neighborhood and urban parks","Impact":"Inconsistent planning and utilization of parks, leading to potential congestion and overcrowding, or underutilization","Mitigation":"Establish clear and standardized definitions for neighborhood and urban parks, and provide guidelines for their planning and utilization","Technologies":"Urban planning and zoning guidelines, Geographic Information Systems (GIS) for spatial analysis","People":"Residents, urban planners, local authorities","Owner":"Local authorities, urban planners, government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of regulatory focus on ecosystem services function of parks","Impact":"Underappreciation of the environmental benefits of parks, leading to inadequate maintenance and preservation of ecosystem services","Mitigation":"Incorporate a regulatory focus on the ecosystem services function of parks into the official norms and guidelines, and raise awareness about the environmental benefits of parks","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring and assessment tools, Geospatial analysis for ecosystem services mapping","People":"Environmental agencies, park maintenance staff, urban planners","Owner":"Environmental agencies, local authorities, park management agencies"},{"Description":"Underestimation of park scale and usage categories","Impact":"Inaccurate planning and management of parks based on their scale and usage, leading to disparities in park accessibility and utilization","Mitigation":"Develop clear and comprehensive criteria for categorizing parks based on scale and usage, and integrate this information into urban planning and management practices","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, Urban planning software, Community engagement platforms","People":"Urban planners, local authorities, park management agencies","Owner":"Urban planning agencies, local government"}]}
